snippet.title: University Rankings: How Important Are They?
snippet.description: Nello Angerilli is the Associate Vice President International for the University of Waterloo in Canada. Previously, he served as Pro-Vice-Chancellor, Student Services and International, at the University of Canterbury in Christchurch, New Zealand, and as an AVP, Students and International, at Simon Fraser University in Vancouver. He holds more [...] read »

snippet.title: U.S. Dominates The World's Top Colleges, For Now
snippet.description: American universities have long been considered the world's finest. But are they slowly being eclipsed by a new cast of less familiar names, representing a more diverse and global frontier of quality higher ed?
